page.title: 12TRAFFIC PROBLEMS
page.content: {Raynes Park}is a built-up area with a busy shopping centre. This means traffic problems arise. As there is only one car-park nearby, people tend to park on the main road, causing obstructions for passing cars and pedestrians. It is made even more troublesome as there is only one road tunnel from one side of the railway to the other. Raynes Park has a busy railway station through which many commuters pass each day. This whole situation should be changed and another tunnel built. But if this system were to be closed for rebuilding, access to the shops, station and other buildings would be impossible. This area is very dangerous for pedestrians to cross these hazardous roads as traffic comes from all directions. The Authorities need to pay attention to the problems.
